turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to check my checking account balance.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! To access your account, could you please verify the last four digits of your social security number and your date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, the last four digits are 1234 and my birthday is January 1st, 1990. Ugh, I always hate having to remember all this security stuff.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. One moment... Alright, your current checking account balance is $542.18.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. And can you tell me what the most recent transaction was?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: The most recent transaction was a debit card purchase at 'Joe's Cafe' for $15.50 on October 26, 2023.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that's expected. But why does it sometimes take a couple of days for transactions to show up? Is there anything I can do to make them appear faster?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a good question. The delay is due to processing times between the merchant's bank and ours. The exact time can vary depending on the merchant and payment network used. Unfortunately, there is nothing you can do to expedite the posting of transactions on your end. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
